dev.kkorolyov.pancake.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.entity.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Entity>

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Entity>
    A single entity found in the game world. Consists of a unique ID and a set of distinctly-typed Component objects.

    • Constructor Summary

        public boolean contains(Signature signature)
        Checks if this entity contains a subset of component types defined by signature
        Parameters:

      • get

        public <T extends Component> T get(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Returns the component of a particular type.
        Parameters:
        type - component type
        Returns:
        appropriate component, or null if this entity contains no such component

      • add

        public boolean add(Component component)
        Adds a component to this entity. If this entity already contains a component of the same type, it is overwritten with this component.
        Parameters:
        component - component to add
        Returns:
        true if adding this component overwrote another component of the same type

      • remove

        public <T extends Component> boolean remove(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Removes a component by type.
        Parameters:
        type - component type
        Returns:
        true if this entity had such a component and it was removed

        Returns:
        true if this entity's signature equals signature
